mapper.select: SELECT C.RN, C.CMT_NO, C.CO_NO, C.NICKNAME, C.CMT_CONTENT, C.CREATE_DATE, C.MODIFY_DATE, C.STATE, C.DEPTH, C.GROUP_NO, C.IP FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, DEPTH ASC, CREATE_DATE ASC) AS RN, CMT_NO, CO_NO, NICKNAME, CMT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, IP FROM C_CMT WHERE CO_NO = #{coNo}) C LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO C_CMT (CO_NO, NICKNAME, CMT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, IP, GROUP_NO) VALUES (#{coNo}, #{nickname}, #{cmtContent}, NOW(), NOW(), 1, 0, #{ip}, 0)
INSERT INTO C_CMT (CO_NO, NICKNAME, CMT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, IP, GROUP_NO) VALUES (#{coNo}, #{nickname}, #{cmtContent}, NOW(), NOW(), 1, 1, #{ip}, #{groupNo})
